rule.name: No empty line
rule.htmlDesc: Generate an issue on empty lines of Xoo source files
rule.mdDesc: Generate an issue on *empty* lines of Xoo source files
rule.mdNote:
As per the [Book of Xoo](http://xoo.sonarsource.com/book):
> Xoo shall not pass!
rule.htmlNote:
As per the Book of Xoo:
Xoo shall not pass!
rule.effortToFixDescription: Effort to fix issue on one line

params.htmlDesc:
Accept whitespace (\s|\t) on the line

This property is available so that a line containing only whitespace is not considered empty.

Example with property set to ``false`` 

 <- One issue here
<- And one here


Example with property set to ``true`` 

 <- No issue here
<- But one here
This is a parameter of type TEXT
Skip a number of lines at the beginning of the file
